_description: Forget not the poor, a macaronic introduction to 583 — two couplets

RylandsLat395.Transcription:
Man with good aduertisementIn mynde compas þis
                        subsequentDum sedes in mensa havyng grete fuson and
                        plentePrimo de paupere pensa releyvyng his necessitee
RylandsLat395.Note: Two lines of verse per MS line.
